result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Huluan Maurice Thomas appeared by video.  Prosecuting attorney Kristian Kanekoa Lindo in court for the State of Wisconsin. Atty. Rosenthal requested to appear via Zoom for today's appearance; however, Atty. Rosenthal has not connected via Zoom. Adjourned for position on preliminary hearing
Hearing scheduled for November 16, 2022 at 08:15 am.

Defendant Huluan Maurice Thomas in court, in custody.  Attorney Gary Edward Rosenthal in court for Huluan Maurice Thomas.  Prosecuting attorney Mark David Bensen in court for the State of Wisconsin. Counsel's first appearance, discovery rec'd and request for video/audio surveillance made, defendant on PO hold and has revocation hearing scheduled.   Adjourned for position on preliminary hearing.
Hearing scheduled for October 27, 2022 at 02:45 pm.
Per request of Atty. Gary Rosenthal, 9-21-2022 hearing rescheduled to 9-27-2022 at 1:30 p.m.

Clerk BMC; Prosecuting attorney Stephanie L Hanson in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Huluan Maurice Thomas in court, in custody.  Attorney Timothy Drewa appeared by video for Huluan Maurice Thomas. Def given complaint, advised of charges, penalties and rights, and probable cause found. Defendant not eligible for State Public Defender. Def will be retaining own attorney. State requests $7,500 cash bond. Def is on a PO Hold. Court orders $5,000.00 cash bond. Preliminary hearing time limits waived. Adjourned for position on preliminary hearing.
Hearing scheduled for September 21, 2022 at 09:45 am.
